column5: The Management and Leadership - MSc course at the University of Leicester provides a comprehensive grounding in the functions of management with an exploration of leadership theory and practice. The content is suitable for private or public sector organisations, and the international focus positions students well for managerial roles in multinational companies. Assessment methods include examinations, coursework, and a final 8,000-word dissertation.This is for you if... you want to combine a comprehensive grounding in the functions of management with an in-depth exploration of the theory and practice of leadership in the 21st century.
